title: Miles-for-Shopping Bonuses from American, Southwest, United
text:
Get Prices 
American 
Through August 16, AAdvantage members can earn up to 3,500 bonus miles when shopping through the AAdvantage Shopping mall, as follows: 500 bonus miles for purchases of at least $125 1,250 bonus miles for purchases of at least $500 3,500 bonus miles for purchases of $1,000 or more 
Southwest 
Through August 16, Rapid Rewards members can earn up to 3,500 bonus points when shopping through Rapid Rewards Shopping , as follows: 500 bonus points for purchases of at least $125 1,250 bonus points for purchases of at least $500 3,500 bonus points for purchases of $1,000 or more 
United 
Through August 12, MileagePlus members can earn up to 4,000 bonus miles when shopping through MileagePlus Shopping , as follows: 500 bonus miles for purchases of at least $125 1,750 bonus miles for purchases of at least $600 4,000 bonus miles for purchases of $1,500 or more 
In addition to the slightly higher bonuses, United is offering five entries into a sweepstakes for every qualified purchase during the promotion period. Grand prize: 100,000 bonus miles plus $2,500 cash.
